episodes.synopsis: After eloping in Vegas, Rob meets his wife's large Mexican-American family for the first time and realizes he's the odd man out.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Rosa persuades Rob and Maggie to have a traditional wedding for the whole family, but Fernando tries talking Rob into calling off the event.
episodes.title: Second Wedding

episodes.synopsis: After Rob and Maggie disagree over a pillow, Rosa and Fernando teach them that the first fight will determine who has the power in the relationship.
episodes.title: The Pillow

episodes.synopsis: Rob becomes obsessed with finding out about Maggie's past. Rosa and Fernando stop speaking to each other after their biggest fight is brought up.
episodes.title: Family Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Rob asks Hector to teach him Spanish so he can understand what Maggie's family is saying about him and Fernando pretends to be on a diet for Rosa.
episodes.title: Rob Learns Spanish

episodes.synopsis: Rob doesn't want kids, so Maggie and her parents conspire to change his mind. The family helps Fernando shoot a commercial for his car wash franchise.
episodes.title: The Baby Bug

episodes.synopsis: Rob plans a romantic weekend at home for him and Maggie. But after Rosa kicks Fernando and Hector out, they move in with Rob.
episodes.title: Romantic Weekend

episodes.synopsis: Rob's usually cold and distant father, George, visits and turns on the charm as he bonds more with Maggie's family than he ever has with Rob.
episodes.title: Dad Comes To Visit

video.title: Rob
video.synopsis: Rob Schneider plays a long-time single guy who finds himself married not just to the woman of his dreams, but also her entire Mexican-American clan.
